channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Diet-to-Go Meal Plan Review: Simple, Healthy, Maybe Soggy
item.description: Diet-to-Go’s ready-to-eat meal delivery offers diabetic, keto, and weight-loss plans. They’re often tasty sometimes soggy.

item.title: The Top New Features in Apple’s iOS 18 and iPadOS 18
item.description: iOS 18.4 adds a few fresh capabilities to Apple’s mobile operating system. Here’s what’s new and how to download the update.

item.title: Oracle under fire for its handling of separate security incidents
item.description: Oracle has denied at least one breach, despite evidence to the contrary, as it begins notifying healthcare customers of a separate patient data breach...

item.title: Soundcore Aeroclip Open-Ear Earbuds Review: Great Value
item.description: Soundcore’s latest take on open earbuds is an affordable winner.

item.title: Apple rolls out Priority Notifications as Apple Intelligence expands to EU
item.description: Apple Intelligence, the iPhone maker’s suite of AI-powered tools and features, is gaining new features. Most notably, the company on Monday announced ...

item.title: Last Chance: 109 Best Amazon Spring Sale Deals for March 2025
item.description: Amazon's sale event ends tonight, so this is your last chance to save on our favorite WIRED-tested home and tech gadgets.

item.title: 31 Best Mac Apps You Should Download Now (2025): Free and Paid
item.description: Savor the sweet taste of these native and third-party Mac apps for better editing, organization, journaling, and more.

item.title: Spark, Mayfield, and Kleiner Perkins pour another $75M into AI data center chipmaker Retym
item.description: Retym, a U.S. chipmaker with Israeli roots, has raised a fresh $75 million series D led by James Kuklinski of Spark Capital. Existing investors — Mayf...

item.title: Blue Origin prepping second New Glenn launch in ‘late spring’
item.description: Jeff Bezos’ space company Blue Origin is preparing for a second launch of its New Glenn mega-rocket in “late spring,” the company announced Monday. Th...

item.title: Apple brings Apple Intelligence to the Vision Pro
item.description: Apple announced on Monday that it’s rolling out visionOS 2.4, bringing Apple Intelligence-powered AI features to the Apple Vision Pro. The update also...
